attributes.action: phase out and ultimately withdraw copper coinage as legal tender
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the introduction of the one penny and two penny pieces inflation has continually reduced their real world worth to the extent that they are now in real terms practically worthless. I petition the Prime Minister to phase out and withdraw these coins from circulation leaving the smallest denomination as the five penny piece. Reducing the burden of worthless change on consumers everywhere.
